scripts.clean: rimraf starterts/ && rimraf starterjs/ && rimraf dist/
scripts.prepare: rimraf dist/ && tsc -p ./ --outDir dist/ && cross-env mkdir -p dist/src/cli/commands/html/sc/ && cp -r src/cli/commands/html/sc/* dist/src/cli/commands/html/sc/ && npm run browser:build
scripts.test-dev: npm run ts:build && cross-env NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 mocha --reporter=list --timeout=0
scripts.test-jenkins: npm run ts:build && cross-env JUNIT_REPORT_PATH=./report.xml mocha --colors --reporter mocha-jenkins-reporter --timeout=0
scripts.start-dev: cross-env NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 cross-env concurrently --raw "npm run ts:watch" "npm run test:watch"
scripts.dev: npm run ts:build && cross-env NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 concurrently --raw "npm run ts:watch" "npm run test:watch"
scripts.start-agent-dev: npm run ts:build && cross-env NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 cross-env DEBUG=http,mindconnect-agent,mindconnect-fileencoder node ./src/demoagent/test-agent.js
scripts.doc: compodoc -p tsconfig.json --output docs --name "@mindconnect/mindconnect-nodejs" --theme material && cp -r images/ docs/
scripts.license: license-checker --csv --onlyAllow "Apache-2.0; Apache*; BSD; BSD-2-Clause; BSD-3-Clause; ISC; MIT; Unlicense; WTFPL; CC-BY-3.0; CC0-1.0" --production
scripts.license:summary: license-checker --summary --onlyAllow "Apache-2.0; Apache*; BSD; BSD-2-Clause; BSD-3-Clause; ISC; MIT; Unlicense; WTFPL; CC-BY-3.0; CC0-1.0" --production
